name: Coffee & Dunn
tagline: The Future of Marketing is Now
description:
Coffee + Dunn is a leading provider of Marketing Solutions for Microsoft Dynamics 365 (CRM) customers. 
With years of experience in marketing process and technology, implementations across enterprises large and small, and varied industry experience, Coffee + Dunn is the "go to"​ provider for sales, marketing, and IT leaders seeking to drive better results.
